blockquote.p: Balloters are invited to provide thier feedback about the best solution for recording the FAIR persistent identifier for this resource.

ul.li: By using the masterIdentifier element with the system valorized with 'urn:ietf:rfc:3986' and the value with the persistent url. This case is described in the provided example.
By using the persistentUrl extension defined in this guide, as suggested for the other non-canonical resources
